column5: Speaking of Northern Lights, how are the Northern Lights this year? We will be North of Ear Falls. Will there be any? Ivy
Ivy, With the amount of beer you drink - you'll see the northern lights all week. 3 more days! Bigfish
There was a real nice show last thursday night, watched them from my deck, 25 miles north of Red Lake, they were excellent, I even woke my kids up so they could enjoy them.
We saw a nice show last Tuesday north of Hawk Junction. Brought some Texas friends up for their first fly-in and it helped make the trip.
Fellow fishermen and Big Fish, Thanks for the info. It's a neat show that Mother nature puts on. Ivy
